reg_address_city_state_zip.title: Voting Residence City or Town, State and Zip Code

mail_info.title: (address where the Absentee Ballot will be mailed)

residence_title.title: I RESIDE (check one of the following)

registered_county_checkbox.title: within the county in which I am registered to vote

outside_county_check_checkbox.title: outside the county in which I am registered to vote

military_checkbox.title: I am member of the merchant marine or uniformed services of the United States on active duty or service (UOCAVA)

overseas_checkbox.title: I am a United States citizen residing outside the territorial limits of the US and the District of Columbia (UOCAVA)

relative_military_checkbox.title: I am a spouse or dependent of a member of the merchant marine or uniformed services of the United State who will be absent from the place where I am qualified to vote because of the members active duty or service (UOCAVA).

ballot_form_title.title: I will receive my ballot by (check one of the following)

ballot_pickup.title: Coming to the office of the county clerk by the time the county clerk's office regularly closes on the day before the election

ballot_email.title: Electronic Means: Receive ballot via email (for UOCAVA voters only) If receiving via email enter email below.

ballot_email_address.title: Email Address for ballot (for UOCAVA voters only)
